A ghost can be a lot of things.
A memory, a daydream, a secret.
translation.zh: 一段记忆、一场白日梦、一个秘密

translation.en: most times, they're just what we want to see.
translation.zh: 只是我们想看到的东西罢了

translation.en: Why would I want to see my Carl like that?
translation.zh: 我怎么会想看到卡尔那个样子？

translation.en: Because it's better than never seeing him again.
translation.zh: 因为总比再也见不到他强

translation.en: Most times, a ghost is a wish.
translation.zh: 多数时候 鬼只是一个希望

translation.en: -You didn't like it. -No, I didn't like it.
My brother just raped the family is what's going on.
translation.zh: 我哥哥把全家都强奸了

translation.en: Look, I get that things haven't exactly been going well with your writing
translation.zh: 我明白你写作不太顺利

translation.en: and when you said you wanted to do a book about the house,
translation.zh: 你说想写一本关于山庄的书

translation.en: I understood that, but this is--
I sent you guys the manuscript in case you had any objections.
translation.zh: 我把草稿发给你们了如果有反对意见可以跟我说

translation.en: -I-- I didn't have to do that. -Of course we object. I object, Steve!
translation.zh: 我也可以不发的 我们当然反对 我反对 史蒂文

translation.en: -Let's calm down a bit. -You be calm, Leigh.
translation.zh: -我们冷静一下-你是能冷静 利

translation.en: It's not your name in here.
Nell, Luke, Theo, they were just kids.
translation.zh: 内尔 卢克 狄奥当时他们都只是孩子

translation.en: Things they told you in confidence--
translation.zh: 他们跟你说的事都是要保密的

translation.en: -I'm clear that they were kids. -You make Mom sound fucking crazy.
translation.zh: -他们当然是孩子-你把妈妈写得像疯子一样

translation.en: -Oh, Mom wasn't crazy? -[Shirley] And the Dudleys and Dad?
translation.zh: -妈妈不疯吗？-还有达德利夫妇和老爸的事情？

translation.en: This is the worst of the bullshit, worse than the tabloids.
translation.zh: 全是瞎胡扯 比小报还不如

translation.en: Dad had every opportunity to set that straight.
translation.zh: 爸爸有大把机会把事情说清楚

translation.en: [chuckles] What am I supposed to write? He said it was haunted.
translation.zh: 我还能怎么写？ 是他说闹鬼的

translation.en: -Those are his words. -He was a wreck.
translation.zh: -是他亲口说的-他情况一团糟

translation.en: -He'd just lost his wife. -And he hasn't said shit since.
translation.zh: -当时妈妈刚死-后来也什么都没说

translation.en: Does he talk to you, Shirl? Did he tell you what happened that night?
translation.zh: 他跟你说话吗 雪莉？那晚发生了什么他跟你说过吗？

translation.en: Because all I've got are those tabloid quotes.
He refuses to tell us anything else.
translation.zh: 他什么都不愿跟我们说

translation.en: When he said those things, he believed them.
translation.zh: 他说那些的时候 自己是相信的

translation.en: In the moment, at least, and-- and you never did.
translation.zh: 至少当时是相信的 你从没信过

translation.en: And now you're digging up that stuff? For a buck?
translation.zh: 现在你却在挖掘这些事情？为了几毛钱？

translation.en: So you can stop living off credit for a change?
translation.zh: 这样你以后就不用赊账过活了？

translation.en: -"A buck"? -Look, I can tell that you're upset,

translation.zh: -但史蒂文完全有权利…-几毛钱？

translation.en: Do you know how much money they're offering on the advance?
translation.zh: 你知道他们预付多少钱吗？

translation.en: We can buy a house, we can move to LA. We can...
translation.zh: 我们可以买房子 搬去洛杉矶

translation.en: I need to start a real life, for my own family.
translation.zh: 我需要开始真正的生活 为了我自己的家人
我们就是你的家人 史蒂文

translation.en: -What you're doing to Mom-- -Mom was mentally ill.
translation.zh: -你这么写妈妈…-妈妈有精神疾病

translation.en: I'll be damned if the apple didn't fall too far from...
translation.zh: 如果不是运气好的话 我也会遗传的
对不起 我不是有意的

translation.en: Now you know what I think.
You publish this, you know what it costs.
translation.zh: 出版的话 你知道代价是什么

translation.en: Did you know it was used as a hospice briefly in the '60s?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？60年代这里是临终关怀院

translation.en: I'd like to talk to you some more about your marriage,
translation.zh: 你婚姻的情况 我想再了解一些

translation.en: and get some background on Carl. Who he was...
translation.zh: 卡尔的背景情况 他是什么样的人

translation.en: I'll need to take some liberties.
But I promise to be respectful.
I'll do it in a way he would have really liked.
translation.zh: 我会按照他喜欢的方式写
看来你真的是什么都没看到

translation.en: -[father] They didn't see anything. -That's not the point.
translation.zh: 他们什么都没看到 问题不是这个

translation.en: My kids don't take the stand, Ross.
translation.zh: 我的孩子们不出庭 罗斯

translation.en: I had my eyes closed when we left.
translation.zh: 我们离开时我眼睛闭着
什么都别说 史蒂文

translation.en: -No one can corroborate your story, Hugh. -That's right.
translation.zh: -没有其他人能证明你说的话-没错

translation.en: [man] The judge hears you talk about packing five kids into your car,
translation.zh: 你跟法官说半夜三点把五个孩子带上车

translation.en: they're gonna wonder why they aren't hearing from those kids.
translation.zh: 如果孩子不作证 他们会怀疑的

translation.en: The media is already piling on.
If we don't give 'em someone else to write about,
translation.zh: 如果不把焦点转移到其他人身上

translation.en: it's gonna be more and more of this.

translation.zh: -都是小报罢了-是家事法院 （克雷恩疯了 声称希尔山庄闹鬼）

translation.en: This type of stuff doesn't help in a custody hearing.
translation.zh: 这些东西在抚养权官司里对你很不利

translation.en: [Younger Hugh] They never filed charges. I was never placed under arrest.
translation.zh: 没有起诉我 也没有逮捕我
政府确认了 没用的

translation.en: They got this off your statement to the police!
translation.zh: 这些是你自己跟警察说的！

translation.en: I wasn't thinking clearly that night. We just lean on that.
translation.zh: 那晚我思绪混乱才这么说的

translation.en: -We can't un-ring this bell. -Okay, fine, they can rip me to pieces,
translation.zh: 覆水难收 好吧 随他们怎么弄我

translation.en: but they don't get to take bites out of the kids.
translation.zh: 但我不会让他们采访孩子们

translation.en: [man] It'd just go a long way if you'd let the press near the house.
translation.zh: 如果让媒体进山庄 对你会很有帮助

translation.en: They'll pay you to walk the grounds, take some pictures.
translation.zh: 在那里走几步 拍点照片 就给你付钱

translation.en: No one goes near the house.
Then sell it. You need the money, Hugh.
translation.zh: 那就卖掉 你需要钱 休

translation.en: You're saying you wanna keep the house your wife just died in?
translation.zh: 老婆刚死在里面 你还要留着房子？

translation.en: You have any idea how that looks?
I want the gates... and the doors kept locked at all times,
translation.zh: 山庄的大门小门都锁上

translation.en: and I wanna know every day that it's empty.
translation.zh: 任何时候里面都不能进人

translation.en: The Dudleys stay on, and it sits there and rots.
translation.zh: 达德利夫妇留着 山庄就这样放着废掉

translation.en: I'm sorry you had to hear that.
translation.zh: 对不起 要你听这些话

translation.en: Do we really have to go live with Aunt Janet?
translation.zh: 我们真的要和珍妮特阿姨一起住吗？

translation.en: -She may show up at the house today. -[Leigh] At my house?
translation.zh: 她今天可能会到家里来 我家？

translation.en: My dad told her to. I didn't get a chance to tell him, it's...
translation.zh: 我爸让她来的 我没找到机会跟他说

translation.en: But I'm sorry. You can just point her to me.
translation.zh: 不好意思 你让她来找我好了

translation.en: Maybe... I can come by, and we can talk about this some more.
You know what you'd have to say. You tell me.
translation.zh: 你知道你要说什么 你自己说

translation.en: Arranging the china and some of the flatware,
so that your father can sell them.
Dad says you and Mr. Dudley come with the house.
translation.zh: 爸爸说你和达德利先生一直没离开过山庄

translation.en: Houses like this one require a staff.
translation.zh: 这么大的山庄需要人来打理
你们为什么不住在这里？

translation.en: At the edge of the property, through the woods,
translation.zh: 在山庄边缘 穿过树林

translation.en: But there are so many rooms.
The staff hasn't lived on the grounds since 1948.
translation.zh: 从1948年起工作人员就不住在宅子里了

translation.en: So the people that lived here before us...
translation.zh: 在我们之前住在这里的人
他们也是独自住在这里吗？

translation.en: No one would live nearer than town.
translation.zh: 最近的人也是住在镇上

translation.en: No one will come any nearer than that.
Well, they didn't seem to be too scared.
My dad found a bunch of stuff in the parlor.
translation.zh: 我爸在起居室发现很多东西

translation.en: Tarot cards and Ouija boards and all that.
translation.zh: 塔罗牌、通灵板 还有别的

translation.en: So, something tells me they weren't too scared of the dark.
translation.zh: 看来他们不是很害怕黑暗

translation.en: And you know what those things do, don't you?
translation.zh: 你知道这些东西怎么用 对吧？

translation.en: They're parlor games. People use them to scare themselves.
translation.zh: 起居室游戏 人们用这些自己吓自己

translation.en: This is the problem with schools these days.
translation.zh: 现在的学校就是有这个问题

translation.en: They teach you the secular world,
And science isn't an exact science, you know.
The world is dark, young man,
translation.zh: 世界是黑暗的 年轻人

translation.en: and the only light is the light of the Lord Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 唯一的光是主耶稣基督的光

translation.en: We need his light in the night.
translation.zh: 在夜里 我们需要祂的光

translation.en: Do you know the Gospels, young man?
translation.zh: 你知道《福音书》吗 年轻人？

translation.en: Hugh and I decided when Steve was little.
translation.zh: 我和休在史蒂文小时候就决定了

translation.en: See, we knew that throughout his life he'd be exposed
translation.zh: 我们知道他的一生 会遇到各种理念和信仰

translation.en: to all sorts of ideas and beliefs.
translation.zh: 会遇到各种理念和信仰

translation.en: That there'd be all sorts of people who'd tell him they had the answers.
translation.zh: 会有各种人告诉他 说他们有答案

translation.en: I'm sorry, I meant no offense.
translation.zh: 对不起 我无意冒犯

translation.en: [chuckles] So yes, he knows the Gospels.
translation.zh: 是的 他知道《福音书》

translation.en: He's also familiar with the Talmud.
The Tao Te Ching, the Torah, the Koran, Greek mythology.
translation.zh: 《老子》、《妥拉》、《古兰经》以及希腊神话

translation.en: And he reads a lot of Carl Sagan, Shakespeare.
translation.zh: 他还看很多卡尔萨根和莎士比亚的著作

translation.en: "Because there are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio..."
translation.zh: “霍拉旭 天地之间有许多事情

translation.en: "...than are dreamt of in your philosophy."
translation.zh: 是你们的哲学里所没有梦想到的呢”

translation.en: Well, I don't suppose either of you have seen Luke.
translation.zh: 你俩应该都没看见卢克吧

translation.en: I assume you tried the tree house?
It never occurs to her you'll be in your tree house. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 她完全没想到你会在你的树屋

translation.en: You know, the one Dad built for you?
I don't wanna go in yet.
How do you spell "no girls allowed"?
I told you last time, that's a bad idea.
translation.zh: 上次跟你说了 这样不行

translation.en: -What happened to your other sign? -[Young Luke] Theo ripped it.
translation.zh: 你之前写的牌子呢？ 狄奥撕掉了

translation.en: [Young Luke] Some girl I saw by the woods.
translation.zh: 我在树林里看见的女孩

translation.en: You know, I used to have imaginary friends, too.
translation.zh: 我以前也有幻想的朋友

translation.en: They go away when you get bigger.
Theo can't rip this one. It's not allowed.
translation.zh: 狄奥不能撕掉这张 不允许的

translation.en: Will you hang out with me?
You can hang out all the time.
Where do you get the ideas for these drawings?
Well, uh, this isn't what it looks like. Um...
How'd you know where to find me?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我在这里的？

translation.en: you can keep the cash and sell that old camera.
translation.zh: 钱你拿好 旧相机你拿去卖了

translation.en: You know, it really isn't what you think.
translation.zh: 真的不是你想象的那样

translation.en: I tried to tell Dad we're... [sighs] ...we're having some issues,
translation.zh: 我本来想跟爸爸说家里出了点问题

translation.en: Did you tell Luke where I live?
translation.zh: 是不是你告诉卢克我住在这里的？

translation.en: You just stood there and watched him loot me?
So you hit up everybody, dragged Luke out,
translation.zh: 你把大家都找个了遍 把卢克拉出来 让爸爸赶飞机过来

translation.en: made Dad hop on a plane.
translation.zh: 把卢克拉出来 让爸爸赶飞机过来

translation.en: You got us all listening. What do you want?
translation.zh: 我们大家都听你说 你要怎样？
有什么重要事情 内尔？

translation.en: Shit, I didn't give him the address.
translation.zh: （爸爸） 妈的 我没给他发地址

translation.en: Hey, I tried to tell you, we're--
translation.zh: 嗨 我正要跟你说 我们…

translation.en: You hear me? I said it's about Nell.
translation.zh: 听见了吗？我说是内尔的事情

translation.en: -I know, I just walked in, and she's-- -Nell was lying.
translation.zh: -我知道 我刚进来 她在…-内尔骗我的

translation.en: She wasn't in LA. She was at the house, Steve.
translation.zh: 她不在洛杉矶 她在山庄 史蒂文
